/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/sprite-test.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/sprite-test.dir/src/SimpleAnimationFrame.cpp.o CMakeFiles/sprite-test.dir/src/AnimatedSprite.cpp.o CMakeFiles/sprite-test.dir/src/ResourceManager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/sprite-test.dir/src/Sprite.cpp.o CMakeFiles/sprite-test.dir/src/BitmapResource.cpp.o  -o bin/sprite-test -lallegro -lallegro_font -lallegro_image -lallegro_ttf -lallegro_primitives
